text: Stanley "Stan" Rapp (born July 26, ? in the Bronx, New York) is widely acknowledged for his contributions to the field of marketing and advertising.http://www.authorsasexperts.com/profile.php?aid=178 Together with his then-partner, Tom Collins, he co-founded and served as Chief Executive Officer of Rapp Collins Worldwide (today rebranded as Rapphttp://www.adbrands.net/us/rapp_us.htm), for 23 years.http://www.dmnews.com/stan-rapp/article/158524/ Stan also served as the Chief Executive Officer of McCann Relationship Marketing, MRM Worldwide, Inc. since 1997, and as an Advisor of Advertising & Marketing Communications at TMX Communications Inc.http://investing.businessweek.com/research/stocks/people/person.asp?personId=870345&ticker;=NXES&previousCapId;=1052496&previousTitle;=Halyard%20Capital He has been recognized by Ad Age magazine as one of the “101 individuals who shaped advertising in the 20th Century”http://www.authorsasexperts.com/profile.php?aid=178 and was elected to the Direct Marketing Association Hall of Fame.http://adage.com/article/rance- crain/dma-hall-famer-stan-rapp-original-influencer/147945/ Direct Marketing magazine also named him one of its select group of “industry legends” and he is one of only two recipients of the Direct Marketing Educational Foundation’s Vision Award.http://www.authorsasexperts.com/profile.php?aid=178 == Works == Stan is the co-author of the international best seller, MaxiMarketing,https://www.amazon.com/Maxi-marketing-Direction-Advertising- Promotion-Marketing/dp/0452262380 which first predicted the turnaround from mass marketing to an individualized marketing paradigm.http://www.goodreads.com/book/show/506379.Maxi_marketing He is also the co-author of the book, Max-e-Marketing in the Net Future, that focuses on how web-based technologies are reshaping the direct and relationship marketing fields.https://www.amazon.com/Max-E-Marketing-Net-Future-Imperatives- Outsmarting/dp/0071364722 His book, edited for McGraw-Hill, Reinventing Interactive and Direct Marketing, introduces a visionary iDirect Marketing paradigm for the digital era.http://www.mhprofessional.com/product.php?isbn=0071638024 Six other books followed including Max-e-Marketing in the Net Future and Reinventing Interactive and Direct Marketing.https://www.amazon.com/Stan-Rapp/e/B001H6S1PC In mid-2014, he began writing the book, Entangled Marketing, with Sebastian Jespersen, CEO of the global digital agency Vertic, on how to move beyond traditional engagement marketing to build entangled customer relationships that deliver robust ROI at all times.http://digitalcopenhagen.dk/speakers/stan-rapp/ == References == Category:American marketing businesspeople
